data.paragraph: Spectrum Reach is the marketing platform of choice to help your business reach new heights, without breaking your budget.
data.heading: Powered By Your Potential

data.html:
Our Platform is our promise to you

Combined with our national scale and resources, only we can deliver.

steps.heading: Connected to Content
steps.secondaryParagraph: Share the stage and align your brand with over 400 of the most-watched and most-loved programs across 50+ networks.

steps.heading: Zero In
steps.secondaryParagraph: Reach the right customers on TV with our state-of-the-art audience targeting and interactive capabilities.

steps.heading: Measurability Without Measure
steps.secondaryParagraph: Use our unique data and insights to access your best customers across 30 million households.

steps.heading: We Are Your Neighbors
steps.secondaryParagraph: Collaborate with a dedicated team in your community to develop a custom marketing strategy.

steps.heading: Lights. Camera. Action. Sales.
steps.secondaryParagraph: Tell a story that resonates with your audience with help from our award-winning in-house agency, Kernel.

items.heading: Television
items.paragraph: TV is now everywhere. Air your targeted advertisement during news, sports, and award winning shows on multiscreen.

items.heading: Audience Extension
items.paragraph: TV is now everywhere. Air your targeted advertisement during news, sports, and award winning shows on multiscreen.

items.heading: Data & Services
items.paragraph: TV is now everywhere. Air your targeted advertisement during news, sports, and award winning shows on multiscreen.

steps.label: Scale
steps.heading: Scale that works for you
steps.paragraph: Spectrum Reach operates in 27 states and 94 markets. We’re like your neighbors, who happen to be advertising experts. From reaching 30 million homes to targeting homes within a mile of your business, we have your back.

steps.label: Regional
steps.heading: Focus on where you need to be
steps.paragraph: If your business is invested in only one part of the country, narrow your target for a wiser spend.

steps.label: Markets
steps.heading: Aim for a smaller target
steps.paragraph: Your business only serves one market area. This is so easy.

steps.label: Local
steps.heading: Where you are is where it's at
steps.paragraph: This is your zone, your town, your neighborhood. Get ready with a smile because your customers are going to be dropping by.

personas.heading: Local Advertising
personas.paragraph: Spectrum Reach has markets across the country, with teams that know your neighborhood inside and out.

personas.heading:
National 
Advertising
personas.paragraph: Spectrum Reach puts your message in front of targeted customers across the country and across all screens.

personas.heading: Agency Solutions
personas.paragraph: Your clients trust you to help them navigate the complicated, ever-evolving media landscape. You can count on Spectrum Reach.

personas.heading: Automotive Advertising
personas.paragraph: The automotive industry is saturated with ads. Break through the clutter with Spectrum Reach.
